BayeSN
==================================

Welcome to the documentation for BayeSN.

About
------------------------------------
This is the documentation for BayeSN, the optical-NIR SED model for type Ia supernovae
as outlined in Mandel+2020 MNRAS 510, 3. Specifically, this implementation is built using numpyro and
leverages GPU acceleration to enable performance increases of a factor of ~100 compared to running on CPU.
